Package ws.rest.politicians.resource

Class PoliticalPartyResource

java.lang.Object
ws.rest.politicians.resource.PoliticalPartyResource
@Path("/parties") public class PoliticalPartyResource extends Object
This class implements multiple HTTP methods to interact with the parties resource in the REST web service.
Since:
2023-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Courtin Florent

  • Method Details

    • addPoliticalParty

      @POST @Consumes("application/xml") @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addPoliticalParty(PoliticalParty pp)
      HTTP POST method that allows to add a political party in the REST web service (and database). The political party must be named as one of the 11 political parties that really exist in the Assembl√©e Nationale, otherwise it cannot be added to the database.
      Parameters:
      pp - The political party to add
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • getPoliticalParty

      @GET @Path("/{id}") @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPoliticalParty(@PathParam("id") String id)
      HTTP GET method that allows to get political party informations with his id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the political party
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • getAllPoliticalParties

      @GET @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPoliticalParties()
      HTTP GET method that allows to get informations about all the political parties.
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request

    • addInfoPoliticalParty

      @PUT @Path("/{id}") @Produces("application/xml") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addInfoPoliticalParty(@PathParam("id") String id)
      HTTP PUT method that updates the political party informations with nosdeputes.fr API.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the political party
      Returns:
      Return a Response object according to the state of the request
